title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 635-12.9 - Fee schedules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 635-12.9 - Fee schedules

State Regulations
(a) This
section applies to all services, whether or not they are preexisting
services. (b) For community
residential habilitation services (delivered in a community residence which is
not an individualized residential alternative [IRA]), the fee shall equal the

Medicaid fee OPWDD established for the community residential habilitation
services for the dates the services were provided. (c) For residential habilitation services
provided in an IRA, the fee shall equal the Medicaid price OPWDD established
for the IRA residential habilitation services for the dates the services were
provided. (d) For residential
habilitation services provided in a family care home, the fee shall equal the

Medicaid price OPWDD established for the family care residential habilitation
services for the dates the services were provided. (e) For at home residential habilitation
services, the fee shall equal the Medicaid fee OPWDD established for the at
home residential habilitation services for the dates the services were
provided. (f) For day treatment
services, the fee shall equal the Medicaid fee OPWDD established for the day
treatment facility for the dates the services were provided. (g) For an ICF/DD, the fee shall equal the

Medicaid rate OPWDD established for the ICF/DD for the dates the services were
provided, excluding any day program services add-on for education and related
services in accordance with Title 8 NYCRR. (h) For day habilitation services, the fee
shall equal the Medicaid price OPWDD established for the day habilitation
services for the dates the services were provided. (i) For Medicaid service coordination, the
fee shall equal the payment level applicable to the individual's situation as
stated in the Medicaid service coordination vendor contract between the
provider and OPWDD in effect on the dates the services were provided. (j) For prevocational services, the fee shall
equal the Medicaid price OPWDD established for the prevocational services on
the dates the services were provided. (k) For supported employment services, the
fee shall equal the Medicaid fee OPWDD established for the supported employment
services for the dates the services were provided. (l) For respite services, the fee shall equal
the Medicaid price OPWDD established for the respite services for the dates the
services were provided. (m) For
blended or comprehensive services, the fee shall equal the price OPWDD
established for the blended or comprehensive services for the dates the
services were provided. (n) For
hourly community habilitation services, the fee shall equal the Medicaid fee
OPWDD established for the hourly community habilitation services for the dates
the services were provided. (o) For
community habilitation phase II services, the price shall equal the Medicaid
fee OPWDD established for community habilitation phase II services for the
dates the services were provided. Notes
